description: LLM model configuration for wind forecasting

notes.temperature: Range 0.0-1.0. Higher = more random/creative, Lower = more deterministic. Default: 1.0
notes.top_p: Nucleus sampling. Range 0.0-1.0. Lower = more constrained vocabulary. Default: 1.0 (no constraint)
notes.maxDailyLlmCalls: Maximum LLM API calls per day (PST timezone). Protects against runaway costs. Default: 6 (typical NWS updates: 3-4/day)
notes.useDummyForecastWhenUnavailable: If true, return realistic dummy forecast data when LLM forecast fails and no cache available. DEFAULT: false for production safety. Use for development/testing only.
